title: Bowling
description: Have fun making strikes at the bowling alley!

title: Hike
description: Take some fresh air. Go for a hike and enjoy the nature. Be sure to bring snaks

title: Cinema
description: Action, Comedy, Scary. You choose! Go to the cinema and enjoy your movie

title: Park
description: Nice day to go to a park. Enjoy the day and take a walk, maybe you can take a book and read or have a picnic

title: Museum
description: Today is a good day to learn something new. Go to a museum!

title: Amusement Park
description: Time to ride a roller coaster or visit a hunted mantion. Visit an amusement park

title: Aquarium
description: Are you afraid of sharks? Go visit them at the aquarium

title: Indoor Bouldering
description: Do you want to improve your fiteness and have fun. Try going climbing

title: Concert
description: Maybe your favorite band is on town. Go to a concert and have fun

title: Cooking Class
description: Are you hungry? Why don't you cook something new. You can use your familiy's secret recipie

title: Go Karts
description: Show everyone you are the best driver. Go to the Go Karts

title: Ice Skating
description: It might not be snowing outside but you can go ice skating!

title: Reading
description: Maybe it's time to reax. Grab a cup of tea and read a book

title: Yoga Class
description: Are you feeling tense? Try a yoga class to loosen up your muscles

title: Theater
description: Any new play, maybe a musical that you might want to check out?

title: Trampoline Park
description: Do you want to feel like you are flying? Why don't you go jumping to a trampolin park

title: Lazer Tag
description: Hope you have better aim than a stormtrooper. Go and don't use shinny clothes or they will see you

title: Dance Class
description: Salsa, Hip-Hop or maybe a little Rock n' Roll. Show your best moves

title: Painting Class
description: Have you ever wanted to feel like Picaso? Why don't you try it.

title: Fitness Class
description: Get stronger, faster and burn some calories. Try any fitness class of your choosing

title: Ice Cream
description: The weather looks nice for an ice cream. Maybe choose a new flavour this time.

title: Golf Range
description: Do you want to hit something and make it fly far away? Try going to a golf range

title: Zoo
description: Learn things about animals while you see these magnificent creatures.

title: Fishing
description: It might look easy but you need a lot of patience. Try it!

title: Arcade
description: Are you more of a Pac-Man or a Street Fighter person. Go get some tickets at the arcade
